_header: As Jesu went in the Jewry
_description: Gospel for Thursday after Fourth Sunday in Lent, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Als ihesu crist went in þe iewryvnto him had þai grete enuy…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And so sal ilka man haue his medeTo wele or wa efter his dede
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Dixit ihesu crist turbis iudeorum.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia v post dominicam iiii quadragesimam Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 59va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.126-128.
